鄗字的基本解释

鄗
hào
〔鄗县〕古地名，在今中国河北省柏乡县北。

鄗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hào］
［《廣韻》胡老切，上晧，匣。］
［《廣韻》呵各切，入鐸，曉。］
(1)同“鎬”。镐京。在今陕西西安西。
(2)春秋晋邑名，战国属赵。在今河北柏乡北。东汉光武帝即位于此，改名高邑。
(3)通“蒿”。春秋齐地。在今山东省蒙阴县西北。
[②]［qiāo］
［《廣韻》口交切，平肴，溪。］
山名。在今河南荥阳境内。
[③]［jiāo］
［《字彙補》居囂切］
通“郊1”。
(1)春秋晋地。
(2)城外。

鄗字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄗； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1276第05
【廣韻】胡老切【集韻】下老切【韻會】合老切，?音皓。【正字通】春秋晉邑，戰國屬趙。【左傳·哀四年】齊國夏伐晉，取郉、任欒、鄗。【註】鄗，晉地。後漢光武卽位于此，攺名高邑，卽今趙州高邑縣。　又與鎬通。【後漢·馮衍傳】西顧酆、鄗。【註】酆、鄗，二水名。文王都酆，武王都鄗。　又【廣韻】口交切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】丘交切，?音敲。水名。【左傳·宣十二年】晉師在敖、鄗之閒。【註】敖、鄗，二水名，在滎陽縣西北。　又【唐韻】呼各切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】黑各切，?音壑。又【集韻】虛到切，音耗。義?同。　又【字彙補】居囂切，音郊。地名。與郊同。【史記·秦本紀】取王官及鄗。【左傳·文三年】作郊。

考證：〔【左傳·哀四年】齊國夏伐晉，取郉欒任鄗。〕　謹照原文欒任改任欒。

Huan
Basic explanation of words
Huan
hào
〔Jianxian〕An ancient place name, located in the north of Baixiang County, Hebei Province, China.
Huan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hào］
["Guangyun" Hu Laoqie, Shang Hao, Xia. ]
["Guangyun" He each cut, enter the duo, Xiao. ]
(1) Same as "pick". Ho Kyung. In today's Xi'an, Shaanxi.
(2) The name of Jinyi in the Spring and Autumn Period, and it belongs to Zhao in the Warring States Period. In today's north of Baixiang, Hebei. Emperor Guangwu of the Eastern Han Dynasty was located here and renamed Gaoyi.
(3) Pass "Artemisia". Spring and autumn together. In today's northwest of Mengyin County, Shandong Province.
[②]［qiāo］
["Guangyun" oral sex cut, flat food, creek. ]
Mountain name. In today's Xingyang, Henan.
[③] [jiāo]
["Zihuibu" Ju Xiaoqie]
Same as "Suburb 1".
(1) Spring and Autumn Jindi.
(2) Outside the city.
Huan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Youji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　鄗; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1276 05
[Guang Yun] Hu Laoqie [Jiyun] Xia Laoqie [Yunhui] He Laoqie,? Yin Hao. [Zhengzitong] Jinyi in the Spring and Autumn Period, the Warring States Period belongs to Zhao. [Zuo Zhuan·Ai Four Years] The Xia Dynasty of the Qi State fought the Jin Dynasty, taking Xie, Ren Luan, and Shan. [Note] Shan, Jindi. Guangwu of the Later Han Dynasty was located here, renaming Gaoyi, now Gaoyi County of Zhaozhou.　 Talk to Ho again. [Later Han·Feng Yan Chuan] Xi Gufeng and Huan. [Note] Feng, Feng, Ershui name. The king of Wen is the capital of Feng, and the king of Wu is the capital.　 [Guang Yun] Oral sex cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Qiu cut,? Sound knock. Water name. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Twelve Years] The Master of Jin was in Ao and Shan Zhixian. [Note] Ao and Shan, the names of Ershui, are located in the northwest of Xingyang County.　 [Tang Yun] Hu Geqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Hui] [Zheng Yun] Hei Geqie,? Yin gully. Also 【Jiyun】virtual to cut, sound loss. Righteous? Same.　[Word Supplement] Ju Xiao cut, sound Jiao. Place name. Same as the suburbs. 【Historical Records·Qin Benji】Take Wangguan and Huan. [Zuo Zhuan·Wen Three Years] As Suburbs. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Ai Four Years] Qi Kingdom Xia expedition to Jin, take Xuan Luan Renhao. 〕 　 I would like to change Ren Luan according to the original Luan Ren.

Name meaning
Nothing.
hào, qiāo
собств.
1) hào вм. 镐 (Хаоцзин - столица Западного Чжоу)
2) hào ист. Хао (город в княжестве Цзинь во времена Чуньцю на территории нынешней пров. Хэбэй)
3) qiāo * Цяо (гора на территории нынешней пров. Хэнань)
